attributes.action: Let black people have the same rights as white people do.
attributes.background: I read that a student couldn't do a tutoring career as he was called unfit as he wasn't 'normal english' . People need to start treating people how they want to be treated no matter what their skin colour is.

rejection.details: It is already against the law to discriminate against someone because of their race, colour, and nationality (including citizenship), ethnic or national origins: https://www.equalityhumanrights.com/en/equality-act/protected-characteristics#race
